articles.description: Following the updates, brokerage Motilal Oswal reiterated a buy on the Tata Motors stock for a price target of Rs 800 which is a 14% upside over the Monday closing price of Rs 789.
articles.content: Shares of Tata Motors jumped 3% to hit their 52-week peak of Rs 809.20 on Tuesday after the company reported a 27% uptick in Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) wholesales for the quarter ended December 30, 2023… [+2219 chars]

articles.title: December life insurance data: LIC's premium rises by 94%, SBI Life sees 21% growth - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The premium for Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) has seen a growth of 94% on-year, and the Individual APE has also risen by 2% compared to the last year.

articles.title: Premier Energies bags Rs 1,700 crore order from NTPC - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The order is for NTPC's Nokh solar PV project in Rajasthan, a company statement said.
articles.content:
Premier Energies on Tuesday said it has bagged an order worth Rs 1,700 crore from NTPC for supply of 608 MW bifacial solar photovoltaic modules.
The order is for NTPC's Nokh solar PV project in Raja… [+295 chars]

articles.title: Technical Stock Pick: Contra Buy! What does the 3-dip pattern tell about Kotak Mahindra Bank price movemen - The Economic Times
articles.description: The stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 2063 on 31st May 2023, but it failed to hold on to the momentum. The stock closed at Rs 1826 on 8th January 2024, translating into a fall of over 11%.
articles.content: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd, part of the private banking space, has fallen over 11% from May 2023 highs but it has bounced back from crucial support and the upmove could extend towards 2000 levels.Short-… [+1895 chars]
